div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2313 Pont de Molins, near Figueras, 1868 (826) Burial: end 4th cent. B.C. (Guadan) Contents: 46+ AR. Pot hoard with silver bars and frags. Emporiae: 8 fr. Unc. Spanish: 23 fr. Massalia: 10 fr. (incl. some types as Auriol) Cumae: 1 dr. Metapontum: 1 st. frag. Athens: 2 tetradr. frag. Unc. (Apollonia?): 1 frag. Disposition: Barcelona (with some excep- tions) Pujol y Camps, MNE 1872-3, pp. 16-20 Delgado, MAE III, pp. 174, 594 Zobel y Zangroniz, MNE 1877-9, pp. 113-7 Botet y Siso, Les Monedes Catalanes I (Barcelona, 1908), pp. xxxv-xxxviii Amoros, MEAD, p. 49 and passim Garcia y Bellido, Hispania Graeca II (Barcelona, 1948), pp. 223-4 de Guadan, MPER, pp. 90-6
